CmdLine: echo "# Installing nginx" ;  apt-get update -qq ;  apt-get install -qq -y software-properties-common ;  add-apt-repository -y ppa:nginx/stable ;  apt-get -qq -y install nginx ;  echo "daemon off;" >> /etc/nginx/nginx.conf ;  chown -R app:app /var/log/nginx ;    echo "# Clean up" ;  apt-get remove -qq -y software-properties-common ;  apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /setup /build
Commands.Name: run
